text:
[Verse]
Walking down a lonely street
Whispers in the rain
Every drop a mystery
Calling out your name

[Verse 2]
Footsteps echo in the night
Shadowed by the past
Searching for that flicker light
Hoping it will last

[Chorus]
Whispers in the rain
Calling out again
Whispers in the rain
Can you feel the pain

[Verse 3]
Puddles form beneath my feet
Memories so clear
Every storm and every beat
Brings you closer near

[Bridge]
Echoes of a long lost song
Played upon the wind
Together is where we belong
Until the very end

[Chorus]
Whispers in the rain
Calling out again
Whispers in the rain
Can you feel the pain
title: Whispers in the Rain
